skill.name: Receipt Scanner Master
skill.description: Master receipt scanning operations including parsing, debugging, enhancing accuracy, and database integration. Use when working with receipts, images, OCR issues, expense categorization, or troubleshooting receipt uploads.
skill.summary: Master receipt scanning operations including parsing, debugging, enhancing accuracy, and database in...
skill.author: EGAdams

security_audit.summary: This is a pure documentation skill (SKILL.md only) describing a receipt scanning system. No executable code is included in the skill itself. The skill references external Python/JS code but only describes its purpose and usage. All described capabilities (file upload, API calls, database access) are legitimate for a receipt scanning application.

content.value_statement: Receipt scanning requires accurate OCR extraction and database integration. This skill provides complete guidance for parsing receipt images, debugging extraction errors, and building reliable expense tracking workflows with Google Gemini AI.
actual_capabilities: Parse receipt images (JPG, PNG, WebP, PDF) into structured data
Debug OCR accuracy issues and extraction errors
Enhance receipt parsing engine and AI prompts
Test receipt uploads through web interface
Validate extracted data against actual receipts
limitations: Requires Gemini API key for OCR processing
Needs local API server running for full functionality
Only processes image and PDF receipt files
Categorized items must be saved manually after parsing

use_cases.title: Track business expenses
use_cases.description: Scan and categorize receipts from business purchases for tax and accounting purposes.

use_cases.title: Build receipt integration
use_cases.description: Integrate OCR receipt parsing into expense tracking applications with database storage.

use_cases.title: Automate data entry
use_cases.description: Convert paper receipts to digital expense records with automated categorization.

prompt_templates.title: Parse a receipt
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the Receipt Scanner Master skill to parse the receipt image at [file_path]. Extract all line items, prices, merchant name, and totals. Report the total amount spent.

prompt_templates.title: Debug OCR errors
prompt_templates.prompt: The receipt parser keeps reading prices incorrectly (e.g., $4.99 as $9.99). Use the skill to enhance the Gemini prompt with digit recognition rules for 4 vs 9 confusion.

prompt_templates.title: Integrate with database
prompt_templates.prompt: Show me how to modify the receipt endpoints to validate parsed data before saving to the expenses database. Include math validation for line totals.

prompt_templates.title: Build complete workflow
prompt_templates.prompt: Create a complete receipt scanning workflow using the Receipt Scanner Master skill. Include: image preprocessing, Gemini API integration, data validation, database storage, and error handling.

best_practices: Start with high-quality images: clear, well-lit, straight photos work best for OCR accuracy
Test incrementally: parse, validate, then save. Do not skip validation steps
Build a validation suite: collect problematic receipts and test regularly to identify patterns
anti_patterns: Skipping validation: Always verify line totals match quantity times unit price
Saving without categorization: Items without categories are not saved to the database
Ignoring image quality: Blurry or dark receipts cause OCR errors and misread prices

faq.question: What image formats are supported?
faq.answer: Receipt Scanner Master supports JPG, PNG, WebP, and PDF files for receipt parsing.

faq.question: What is the file size limit?
faq.answer: Maximum file size is 10MB by default. Configure RECEIPT_MAX_SIZE_MB in settings to change.

faq.question: Can I use this without a database?
faq.answer: Yes, you can parse receipts without saving. Use /api/parse-receipt to get extracted data only.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Receipts are processed locally and stored in app/data/receipts/ with Gemini API calls for OCR.

faq.question: Why are prices misread?
faq.answer: Common issues: blurry images, poor lighting, digit confusion (4/9, 3/8). Improve image quality or enhance the prompt.

faq.question: How does this compare to other OCR tools?
faq.answer: Uses Google Gemini AI for extraction with fallback models. More customizable than basic OCR libraries.
